summary: Ensured navigation bar and header consistency across all pages by updating projects.html, experience.html, skills.html, and contact.html to match the main page's professional banner structure. Removed hamburger menu scripts and simple headers, implementing unified contact info banner, professional banner with geometric shapes, brand name, tagline, and clean navigation menu across all pages.
current_status: All website pages now have consistent navigation and header structure, creating a unified professional appearance throughout the site. The navigation experience is seamless and maintains brand consistency across all pages.
